features.name: Policy Hub
features.description: Central policy discovery and search interface for browsing all organizational policies

features.name: My Policies
features.description: Personal policy dashboard showing policies assigned to the current user and their acknowledgement status

features.name: Policy Admin
features.description: Administrative interface for managing policies, users, and system configuration

features.name: Policy Author
features.description: Policy creation and editing interface for authoring new policies with rich text editing

features.name: Policy Details
features.description: Detailed policy view showing full policy content, version history, and acknowledgement options

features.name: Policy Pack Manager
features.description: Policy package bundling interface for grouping related policies together

features.name: Quiz Builder
features.description: Interface for creating and managing policy comprehension quizzes

features.name: Quiz Taker
features.description: Component for users to take policy comprehension quizzes

features.name: App Layout
features.description: Shared application layout component with header and footer

features.name: Policy Manager Header
features.description: Branded header component for the Policy Manager application

features.name: Splash Screen
features.description: Application splash/landing screen component

features.name: Analytics Service
features.description: Service for tracking and reporting policy usage analytics

features.name: Policy Cache Service
features.description: Caching layer for policy data to improve performance

features.name: Approval Service
features.description: Workflow service for policy approval processes

features.name: Document Service
features.description: Services for document management and generation

features.name: Gamification Service
features.description: Points, badges, and leaderboards for policy engagement

features.name: Search Service
features.description: Policy search functionality with AI-enhanced search

features.name: Graph Service
features.description: Microsoft Graph API integration for user and group data

features.name: SharePoint Service
features.description: Core SharePoint data access layer using PnP.js

features.name: Export Service
features.description: Services for exporting data to Excel, PDF, and PowerPoint

features.name: Notification Services
features.description: Browser and email notification capabilities

features.name: Data Validation Hooks
features.description: React hooks for form validation and field validation

features.name: Data Caching Hooks
features.description: React hooks for data and template caching

features.name: Policy Models
features.description: TypeScript interfaces for policy data structures

features.name: Workflow Models
features.description: TypeScript interfaces for workflow and approval data
